meanings.definition: Not belonging to or characteristic of the dominant or prevailing cultural, social, or political group.
meanings.sent1: Her unique fashion sense was nonmainstream compared to her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The nonmainstream music genre attracted a small but dedicated following.
meanings.sent3: The nonmainstream art exhibit featured upside-down paintings.
meanings.sent4: His nonmainstream views on education turned heads in the academic community.
meanings.sent5: The nonmainstream film challenged traditional storytelling methods.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to or following the usual or widely accepted beliefs, practices, or trends.
meanings.sent1: The nonmainstream book club only read obscure titles.
meanings.sent2: Her nonmainstream approach to problem-solving often yielded creative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The nonmainstream dance routine left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His nonmainstream theories about time travel sparked intense debates.
meanings.sent5: The nonmainstream fashion show featured avant-garde designs.
